subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets fell behind early, took the lead late, lost it, then tied the score when they were down to their final out — all before extra innings, when a Martin Prado hit scored Miami’s winning run.
snippet: The Mets fell behind early, took the lead late, lost it, then tied the score when they were down to their final out — all before extra innings, when a Martin Prado hit scored Miami’s winning run.
